name: Charlie Chimp and the Great Escape
overview: Can you help Charlie Chimp solve the many puzzles ahead of him and escape from the German prison camp forever? You must travel around the game area collecting any objects that you think may be useful in your quest. You will met many different characters throughout your journey and it may be necessary to communicate and be friendly with them in order to complete the game.Press the fire button to interact with an object or character. Created using the Ultimate Software Construction Kit.
